subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Television ratings for B.C.S. bowl games have been among the worst in history, and the B.C.S. coordinator, Mike Slive, continues to push the conversation toward an evolution in college football’s postseason.
snippet: Television ratings for B.C.S. bowl games have been among the worst in history, and the B.C.S. coordinator, Mike Slive, continues to push the conversation toward an evolution in college football’s postseason.
